author: lgo
msg: This change was originally made to allow a client to continue without error even
if the response handler did not completely read the response. This doesn't make
a lot of sense, and indicates an error in the implementation of the response
Besides that, it makes serf abort (double free) when the response handler has

author: rooneg
msg: Concatenate repeated headers using comma as separator, as per RFC 2616,

author: pquerna
msg: Rework the serf pollset to be a set of function pointers.  For existing API users, there are no changes, but by using serf_create_context_ex, you can choose your own custom event loop.
